author: Alice Chen
content: This capacitor value seems low for the expected ripple current. Consider upgrading to 220uF.

author: Bob Smith
content: Good catch on the LED resistor - the math checks out for 20mA.

author: Alice Chen
content: Overall the power section looks solid. Nice work!

author: Carol Davis
content: Should we add decoupling caps near U1? The datasheet recommends 100nF.
